name: OR_IMP_VERIFY_METHD
description: This table contains documentation regarding implant verification methods.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VERIFY_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The method used for implant verification prior to use in surgery.
